project_descr: Project on Strengthening Uganda’s Disaster Preparedness and Management Capacities

outputs.output_descr: Project on Strengthening Uganda’s Disaster Preparedness and Management Capacities

UNDP Uganda has designed this Project Initiation Plan (PIP) to support the finalization of the Disaster Risk Rediction (DRR)  project that will strengthen Uganda's Disaster Preparedness and Management Capacities. The Project initiation will focus on the following key components; (i) finalisation of the project document  (ii) development of strategic programme and investment framework and  (iii) Oversight and overall coordination of the initiation phase. Key outputs of the initiation phase will include: (i) finalized and signed up project document and (ii) Disaster Risk Recovery  strategic programme investment framework.

project_title: strengthening ug. disaster preparedness & mgt cap
